title: HMCL启动失败
author: liuchenyun1
txt_content:
HMCL启动失败，日志如下
[16:26:11] [Render thread/INFO]: Setting user: qwq
[16:26:16] [Render thread/INFO]: Backend library: LWJGL version 3.2.2 build 10
[16:26:37] [Render thread/WARN]: Failed to create window: 
cxx$a: GLFW error 65542: WGL: The driver does not appear to support OpenGL
        at cxx.b(SourceFile:215) ~[1.15.2.jar:?]
        at org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWErrorCallbackI.callback(GLFWErrorCallbackI.java:36) ~[lwjgl-glfw-3.2.2.jar:build 10]
        at org.lwjgl.system.JNI.invokePPPP(Native Method) ~[lwjgl-3.2.2.jar:build 10]
        at org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFW.nglfwCreateWindow(GLFW.java:1714) ~[lwjgl-glfw-3.2.2.jar:build 10]
        at org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFW.glfwCreateWindow(GLFW.java:1897) ~[lwjgl-glfw-3.2.2.jar:build 10]
        at cxx.<init>(SourceFile:90) ~[1.15.2.jar:?]
        at drh.a(SourceFile:21) ~[1.15.2.jar:?]
        at dbn.<init>(SourceFile:417) ~[1.15.2.jar:?]
        at net.minecraft.client.main.Main.main(SourceFile:166) [1.15.2.jar:?]

[attach]1492983[/attach]

replies.author: 小孩孩
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 小孩孩 于 2020-3-14 13:49 编辑 

更新显卡驱动The driver does not appear to support OpenGL驱动不支持OpenGL
如果显卡太旧了就换新显卡

replies.author: liuchenyun1
replies.txt_content: 显卡是NVIDIAMX150但是显示不支持OpenGL

去MCBBS 客户端整合 里 选一款适合自己的 就好了

https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... 143%5D%5Btype%5D%3D

给你个链接

replies.author: 南鱼座_
replies.txt_content: 换个版本低点儿的java8，你要是找不到明天我给你找一个。
可能是显卡问题，把显卡更新试试
